snippet: The Motion Picture Association of America detected a 78 percent increase over the last decade in such releases, though often a release meant a short run in New York and Los Angeles before video-on-demand sales.
abstract: The Motion Picture Association of America detected a 78 percent increase over the last decade in such releases, though often a release meant a short run in New York and Los Angeles before video-on-demand sales.

headline.main: Many More Indie Films Are Released, but Not Very Widely, Study Finds
